REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2543 reute u f BC-WPP-GROUP-PLC-EXTENDS 06-19 0060

TEXT.TITLE: WPP GROUP PLC EXTENDS ITS OFFER FOR JWT <JWT>
TEXT.BODY: <WPP Group Plc> said it is extending its 50.50 dlrs a share offer for JWT Group Inc until midday June 22. The company temporarily extended the offer on June 17 but did not give an expiration date. Its 45 dlrs a share offer for JWT, which has been rejected by JWT, expires on July 10. Reuter
